title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 110.5 - Confidential information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 110.5 - Confidential information

State Regulations

The following information is considered confidential and
should be furnished on separate pages which can be detached from the rest of
the application: (a) that portion of
the plan of merger which specifically describes nonconforming deposits, loans
and borrowings (see section
110.1
[f]
), as
required; (b) the computation of
deposits for any office of each party to the merger required by section
110.2
(c)(2); (c) the listing of loan participations and
loan participants required by section
110.2
(d)(6); (d) the information required by section
110.2
(e)(2); (e) the income and expense reports required
by section
110.3
(e); (f) the statement required by section
110.3
(f). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
110.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
